settings.text: The EduDrift Corporate Partnership Program aims to proliferate Debate and Public Speaking Learning among its students, through a unique franchising model.

Our Franchise model is designed for businesses who are too busy and occupied with current operations to move and/or expand into another subject of learning. We offer a full suite of services within the Franchise model and prioritize the ones that matter most - teachers, curriculum and profitability.

ONE OF THE FASTEST GROWING PUBLIC SPEAKING FRANCHISES IN THE WORLD

At EduDrift, we aren’t just here to change the lives of our students; our proprietary business model also helps change the lives of our business partners. When you partner with us, you are investing in a dynamic and unique business opportunity, driven by quality and convenience.

REQUIREMENTS

Minimum $10k liquid capital or access to investors or partners, a virtual classroom set up within your present business center, and a love and passion for enrichment learning and changing lives. If you have any questions about the above requirements, financing options, or EduDrift Partners costs, please reach out—we are here for you!

WE SUPPORT YOU

We are here every step of the way to help our business partners achieve their personal and business goals with EduDrift Training. Our ongoing and continuous support starts from the moment they inquire about this opportunity and lasts throughout their journey with us as business partners

EduDrift seeks to tailor Debate Classes to each individual company based on its students and learning outcome needs. Together, EduDrift seeks to empower the Debate community with lower price points, increase student retention rates, and boost business profitability.

As an Academy, you now are able to start a brand new line of classes, without going through the hassle of finding teachers to teach, curriculums to create and profit margins to worry about.

We will handle all of the above, just for you.

INDIVIDUALIZED APPROACH

We understand every company is different. EduDrift works with all of our partners individually to find specific solutions that will deliver the best outcome.

TURNKEY MODEL

EduDrift will work with your team to understand your company’s unique culture, goals, and wellness initiatives – and carve out the perfect addition to your Debate Class program.

EMPLOYEE MORALE

Our Debate classes encourages teamwork, create a sense of community growth within your organization, boost student satisfaction, and improve motivation.

CONVENIENCE

We make Debate classes accessible to your students by providing you with a full suite of online curriculums and learning resources.

RETENTION TOOL

EduDrift’s unique community-based training system is a great tool for team building, recruiting, and retention.
